content:
Add this to userContent.css: 

::-moz-selection {   color: red;   background: yellow; }


https://www.w3schools.com/howto/howto_css_text_selection.asp

Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Directory (Win: Folder), close TB, create a new folder named chrome, create a new document in chrome with a text editor, name it userContent.css, Save as type: All files *.*, copy in the above code, change the colours as desired. Double-click toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to true in Settings/General/Config. editor, restart TB.

Online css generator

video on how to create a css file (Firefox and TB)
creator: sfhowes

content:
You should enter your Apple account password once when you set up the account in Thunderbird.

What is the problem that you are trying to solve?
creator: mozilla98

content: You need to describe your problem in more detail to get any suggestions.
creator: davidsk

content: - install the addon, importexporttools NG, if not already done - highlight Local Folders, rightclick, select the importexport option to import mbox - then, select a desired old folder (ignore msf entries) and click ok to import - repeat for each folder - if you wish to merge with an IMAP folder, create a manual filter to do the transfer. this slows the process a bit to minimize data loss since IMAP was not designed for high volume uploads
creator: davidsk

content: Che c'entra la cartella Draft con il Cestino? Puoi spiegare esattamente cosa hai fatto? A quando risale l'ultimo backup? Si tratta di account POP3 o IMAP?

content:
1) Do not do any banking by email 2) Do not automatically trust any email involving money 3) Your security should be multi-layered and strong, using some of the items in the links below. If you have trouble or are not able to navigate the technical aspects you should get the help of someone you trust.

This has specific recommendations for Thunderbird, including https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/products/thunderbird/privacy-and-security

That has recommendations for email in general.
creator: wsmwk

content:
La giusta combinazione te la dovrebbe fornire la documentazione di Apple. Personalmente non ho account su iCloud, per cui posso solo rimandarti alla pagina del supporto Apple -> https://support.apple.com/it-it/102525

Ti ricordo che la password che devi usare non è quella dell'account iCloud ma una generata appositamente per Thunderbird (come scritto nella guida stessa).
creator: @next

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: There is no default. Your screenshot is showing vertical layout. Describe what is missing for you to get suggestions or fixing this. Thank you.
creator: davidsk
